column5: This three bedroom 2.5 Bath townhouse is located in a beautiful gated community. The area is safe to walk. Your private room is on the 2nd floor with its ensuite bath. You will be 15 mins by uber from the Museums, performing Art Centers,Galleria,Downtown, NRG stadium. Youâ€™ll love my place because of the location, the ambiance, the nice neighborhood.  Host speaks English, French, Spanish and German. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
